info.task: navigate forwards out of a checkbox group
info.title: Navigate forwards out of a checkbox group

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstCheckbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('[role="checkbox"]').focus();

user: With focus on the 'All condiments' checkbox, navigate to the 'Navigate backwards from here' link.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'All condiments' checkbox, navigate to the 'Navigate backwards from here' link.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name 'Navigate backwards from here' is conveyed
